title: Work Experience
text:
Work Experience






For the past two years I have been a data analyst for the UCLA Tennis Consulting Organization. Iâ€™ve mostly been responsible for the data collection, pre-processing and cleaning stages of tennis matches that is eventually used for analytic reports and dashboards. I interned for the Weld-On R&D Lab for the IPS Corporation.
